title: The Best of RISK! Celebrity Stories
description:
Kumail Nanjiani, Pete Holmes, Samantha Bee, Aubrey O'Day, Sarah Silverman and Trevor Noah tell outrageous true stories in our look back at some of our favorite celebrity appearances on RISK!

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Michael Ian Black, J. Walter Hawkes, Andrew Burnes, Marc Maron, Dan Savage, Kumail Nanjiani, Pete Holmes, Aisha Tyler, Beastie Boys, Tom Lennon, Ilana Glazer, Andy Dick, Bubamara Brass Band, Paul F. Tompkins, Samantha Bee, Aubrey O’Day, I’m From Barcelona, The Heavy, Sarah Silverman, Lisa Lampanelli, Rob Delaney, Jonathan Geer, Janeane Garofalo, Kevin Allison, Wyatt Cenec)
